metadata.title: CVE-2024-1938 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Type Confusion in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 122.0.6261.94 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit object corruption via a crafted HTMLpage. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
